name: The Bragger's Club
description:
“You are humbly invited to the Bragger’s Club! Attendance is required!”

You don’t know how you got there. You don’t know why you were invited. However, you’re trapped in a room with only a speaker and mic to communicate with 4 other victims. What could possibly happen?

---

Featuring:

  • FULL VOICE OVER (over 650 voiced lines!!)
  • A Dark, Linear Story with focus on immersion.
  • TWO very different endings
  • Moral Choices and Questions

---

CAST AND TEAM:

  • Eric Dubyu - Protagonist
  • Kevin K Gomez - Joseph
  • Terrance Drye - Cameron
  • Brittany Lauda - Angelica
  • Michaela Laws - Maria
  • James Brown Jr. - A.N.U.B.I.S.
  • Creep-P and Gavin Bailey - Friends
  • Steve "Warky" Nunez - Server
  • Music by Christopher Escalante
  • Editing by Genevieve Rose

---

**This game was developed and created within the span of a full week.

---

ALL SALES ARE FINAL. NO REFUNDS WILL BE GIVEN.
